title: Seagils Official
author: Seagils Official
content: WEBSITEHi Bitcointalk Community! Captain Seagils is here to introduce our Play-To-Earn brain game - SEAGILS.Whatsea is a play-to-earn brain game. Whatsea doesn't welcome you here if you see this or in any form imagine this concept as the new gambling of the internet. WhatSea is created and dedicated to those who are weak in decision makings and because of their phobia.Please check our website for more details. We are looking forward to a good run with the community.GAME CONCEPTHOW TO BUYSEAGNOMICSROADMAP

comments.author: Seagils Official
comments.body: Stay tuned to our Bounty Program. Please share your thoughts, views, suggestions, feedback, etc. We like to hear from you. Thank you.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Why doesn't your roadmap include specific timelines?What progress have you made with partnerships? How many partnerships do you currently have? The most crucial aspect is the ability to secure funding for the project.

comments.author: Seagils Official
comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on June 07, 2023, 04:25:26 PMWhy doesn't your roadmap include specific timelines?What progress have you made with partnerships? How many partnerships do you currently have? The most crucial aspect is the ability to secure funding for the project.Hello, thanks for the question.Our roadmap doesn't include specific timelines because we do not control the market. How long would it take us to reach 1000 holders before we start our marketing campaign? How long will it take us to break above $1m market cap? Unfortunately, we can only take them one after the other. We will do our best to promote the project to reach a wider audience but we can not say we will reach 1000 holders in 1 month or 2. Right now we are not thinking of partnerships, we are focused on stabilizing our project for both the community and the market. Once this area is a bit healthy, we will move over to phase 2 and reach out to other projects for potential partnerships with what fits us.

comments.author: Seagils Official
comments.body: We will be deploying our smart contract tomorrow 9th of June 2023 and our Pair $SEAG / $WETH will be live in Uniswap at 2 pm UTC. Get ready for the big bang!https://twitter.com/seagilspepe/status/1666826124343627777?t=ECBzeB8jw7K9_Tq3KWkmEg&s=19
